author: fwyzard
body:
#### PR description:

Improve out-of-bounds error message for SoA `[]` operator.
For example
```
Out of range index in ConstViewTemplateFreeParams HcalPhase1DigiSoALayout::operator[]: index 3692 out of range 2971
```

#### PR validation:

Code runs, and prints a more expressive error in case of out-of-bounds access.
title: Improve out-of-bounds error message
